_source.short_desc: livepro is purpose-built contact center Knowledge Management. Delivering quick and easy answers to agents, not long documents.
_source.long_desc:
livepro is the premium knowledge management solution trusted globally by contact centers. 
Designed with agents in mind, livepro delivers quick and easy answers - not long confusing documents. Feature-rich yet easy to use, livepro is the single source of truth that seamlessly integrates into your existing contact center toolkit. Reduce onboarding, AHT and improve compliance and customer satisfaction with the only knowledge management system that has COPC Inc. approved technology provider status.
_source.target_audience: Premium Knowledge Management trusted globally by contact centers in every industry. livepro is the single source of truth that seamlessly integrates into your existing CX toolkit.

media.caption: livepro's one of a kind decision making tool, the Rocket. Agents are instant experts thanks to this intuitive feature. Simply ask and answer questions, and subsequent follow up questions appear customised to the customers particular situation.

livepro Announcements are timed to ensure they only display when urgent information is relevant. Say goodbye to clogged email inboxes and information you no longer need thanks to Announcements with desktop and mobile push notification capability.
Smart Search - livepro's search brings up only relevant results, with auto-complete, did you mean suggestions and search scores to help determine relevancy, livepro's Smart Search has you sorted.

Work Instructions, livepro's step-by-step process guidance tool. New agents can go through one step at a time, ensuring compliance, accuracy and consistency - or if a more tenured agent needs to get to a particular step, the drop down function allows this
Document Notes - livepro's standard knowledge article. Create quick knowledge in moments thanks to customisable and on-brand templates with easy to identify iconography.

category_features.name: Cataloging/Categorization
category_features.definition: Tag, organize, and group data using metadata and other criteria

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders

category_features.name: Decision Support
category_features.definition: Support tool that enables users to progress through a series of steps to solve a problem

category_features.name: Discussions / Forums
category_features.definition: Online forums/groups where users can ask questions, share ideas, best practices, etc.

category_features.name: Full Text Search
category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.name: Knowledge Base Management
category_features.definition: Create, store and share information, data, and support articles in a centralized database

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers a smart knowledge base for self-service that integrates seamlessly into it?s help desk software.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers a smart knowledge base for self-service that integrates seamlessly into it?s help desk software. It can be used internally by agents for quick resolutions, and externally by customers to solve their own issues?on any platform. Companies that use Zendesk's knowledge base software can improve agent efficiency and reduce support costs by 50%. This industry leading customer support solution is easy to deploy, yet flexible enough to customize to your needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create a dynamic informational database your whole team can contribute to while they work with flexible knowledge management software.
related_products.features: Create a dynamic informational database your whole team can contribute to while they work with flexible knowledge management software. That way, important material never gets lost when people move between teams or roles, and your team guidelines and enablement documents are always up-to-date. Then easily navigate your knowledge base with custom statuses, hashtags, and filters to find exactly what you need in seconds.

related_products.short_desc: Freshdesk is an easy-to-use customer service software that helps over 50,000 businesses worldwide create stellar customer experiences.
related_products.features: Freshdesk knowledge base helps customers to find answers on their own and enables agents to handle more customer queries efficiently. Some of the key capabilities include creating content in multiple languages, managing content in bulk to save time, using filters to work on specific content, setting up a robust approval process. It is also possible to leverage the AI-powered bots to help customers find relevant answers while keeping them engaged.

related_products.short_desc: Confluence makes information accessible to your whole organization. Use it to capture and preserve all important data and updates.
related_products.features: Making information accessible to your organization is important now more than ever. Confluence can serve as your company's primary Knowledge Management Software tool. Use it to capture, preserve, and organize your most valuable assets. Whether it be company updates, project plans, or other important intel, keep it accessible and trackable with Confluence.

related_products.short_desc: With Zoho Desk, create Multi-brand SEO friendly knowledge base articles on cloud for each of your brand to answer your customers FAQ's.
related_products.features: Zoho Desk is a cloud based Knowledge base software for faster answers and fewer tickets on customer quires and complaints that helps your company to build stronger relationships with customers over multiple channels and languages. Create Multi-brand SEO friendly knowledge base articles for each of your brand to answer your customer's frequently asked questions. This saves your team work on responding to simple questions, and leaves more time to help customers with tricky problems.

related_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
related_products.features: LiveAgent is a complete knowledge management system that provides a fully-featured customer knowledge base. Our customer knowledge base enables customers to quickly find answers without having to submit tickets. Reduce customer wait times, the workload of your agents, as well as the time spent on resolving tickets. With LiveAgent, providing world-class customer service is easy. Start your free trial today, no credit card required.

related_products.short_desc: Notion is the only knowledge management software that connects your wiki, notes and projects in one tool.
related_products.features: Notion is the only knowledge management software that connects your wiki, notes and projects in one tool. Tens of thousands of teams and companies around the world use it to keep their employees informed and working together in one place. By bringing all work and knowledge together and making it highly customizable, Notion creates focus and transparency, while consolidating tools, saving time, and driving more productivity for teams of all sizes.

related_products.short_desc: The worlds #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee with the innovative tools, and unified data.
related_products.features: Help customers find the answers they need across any channel and empower your agents with the best answer to customer questions with the knowledge management solution that works across the world's #1 CRM. Help your customers get exactly what they need using a centralized knowledge base for all your agent and customer information.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is a leading free social knowledge management and collaboration platform used by over 8 million companies worldwide.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is a leading free social knowledge management and collaboration platform used by over 8 million companies worldwide. Available in cloud and on-premise with open source code access. Share and discuss ideas, manage knowledge, manage projects and do more with Bitrix24!

related_products.short_desc: Speed up your IT process by using and creating knowledge base for your service desk software
related_products.features: Despite popular opinion, life as a service desk agent is as unglamorous as it can get. A support agent spends most of his time, answering the same set of questions over and over. Imagine answering "How do I reset my password?" fifty times a day; not only does this make their life incredibly monotonous but it also makes the end-user wait for an answer to a problem or query that actually could be solved in a jiffy with the right guide.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
related_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

similar_products.short_desc: Knowledge engagement software enabling teams to access, collaborate across, and draw upon their organization?s collective intelligence.
similar_products.features: Bloomfire is the leader in knowledge engagement, delivering an experience that connects teams and individuals with the information they need to excel at their jobs. Our cloud-based knowledge engagement platform gives people one centralized, searchable place to engage with shared knowledge and grow their organization?s collective intelligence. For more information or to schedule a demo, visit www.bloomfire.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers a smart knowledge base for self-service that integrates seamlessly into it?s help desk software.
similar_products.features: Zendesk offers a smart knowledge base for self-service that integrates seamlessly into it?s help desk software. It can be used internally by agents for quick resolutions, and externally by customers to solve their own issues?on any platform. Companies that use Zendesk's knowledge base software can improve agent efficiency and reduce support costs by 50%. This industry leading customer support solution is easy to deploy, yet flexible enough to customize to your needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Replace your outdated knowledge management software with Axero. 100% useful. 100% customizable. 100% loved by millions of people.
similar_products.features:
Centralize all of your documents, resources, and employees in one place with Axero. Access your entire organization's consciousness, organize your valuable information, reduce employee questions, prevent knowledge loss, and provide that single source of truth that so many companies desperately need.

Axero's intranet software simplifies how work gets done and delivers custom knowledge management experiences for all your employees.

similar_products.short_desc: Build a powerful, interactive knowledge base for your employees or customers with Stonly.
similar_products.features: Build a powerful, interactive knowledge base for your employees or customers with Stonly. Make it easily accessible wherever it's needed. Forget static, linear help articles. Provide engaging, adaptive guidance that drives self-serve resolutions. See why 1,000's of companies trust Stonly to provide unparalleled support.

similar_products.short_desc: Boost productivity and collaboration throughout the development lifecycle with persistent, just-in-time knowledge sharing.
similar_products.features: Stack Overflow for Teams is a knowledge sharing and collaboration platform that helps teams solve technical challenges through each stage of the development lifecycle. Since Stack Overflow's public platform is already integral to how technologists work, Stack Overflow for Teams makes it easy to share institutional knowledge in a private, central place. It even empowers your team to keep knowledge fresh and relevant by programmatically surfacing content that might be out-of-date.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on knowledge management for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.
similar_products.features: HighQ's modern, adaptable, and continuously-learning legal workflow platform delivers an open and scalable foundation, embedded machine intelligence and analytics, and smart integration points with firm-critical applications. Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: IT Glue is an award-winning documentation platform, helping IT providers dramatically reduce wasted time looking for information.
similar_products.features: IT Glue is an IT documentation software IT professionals. Centralize and standardize your documentation. Get relationship mapping, secure password management, and an automated and structured documentation framework to organize all your information. Have confidence in the security of your information with features like granular access permissions, version history, and more. Track any asset with ease for peace of mind.

similar_products.short_desc: Capacity is an industry leader in support automation for both customers and employees. Get up and running within 30 days.
similar_products.features: Capacity is an industry leader in support automation for both customers and employees. Capacity's AI-powered helpdesk answers more than 84% of all inquiries without human involvement. If Capacity doesn't know an answer, the question is seamlessly escalated to the appropriate subject matter expert via a ticket or live chat. Get up and running within 30 days. Learn more about Capacity.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Digital Adoption Platform software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Adoption Platform tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Adoption Platforms help organizations to onboard and train their customers, employees, partners, and prospects by delivering user guidances, walkthroughs, and tutorials for enterprise applications or websites.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Portal software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Portal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Portal software provides a secure, common gateway to enterprise data and applications, enabling greater efficiency and range for business-to-business, business-to-internal and business-to-consumer transactions in both self-service and on-demand environments. Portal applications typically feature robust content management systems (CMS) allowing the distribution and presentation of key data throughout an enterprise, as well as collaborative work and document synchronization features. Portal solutions also provide integration to external database resources, sales and CRM tools and a variety of management reporting features. Portal software is related to Catalog Management software, Content Management software, Knowledge Management software and Web Collaboration software.

category_features.name: Customer Segmentation
category_features.definition: Process of dividing customers into groups based on common characteristics such as gender, interests, buying habits, or demographic

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Knowledge Management
category_features.definition: Gather, organize, share, and analyze knowledge in terms of resources, documents, and people skills

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Data Collection
category_features.definition: Collect information from multiple sources

category_features.name: Negative Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Identify, track, and respond to negative feedback

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

category_features.name: Sentiment Analysis
category_features.definition: Categorize emotions expressed in written text and identify if they are positive, negative or neutral

category_features.name: Survey/Poll Management
category_features.definition: Create and administer polls and surveys

category_features.name: Text Analysis
category_features.definition: Process of extracting and classifying information from text, such as tweets, emails, product reviews, etc

category_features.name: Brainstorming
category_features.definition: Group collaboration to solve ideas in a productive and concentrated manner.

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: Discussions / Forums
category_features.definition: Online forums/groups where users can ask questions, share ideas, best practices, etc.

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Real Time Editing
category_features.definition: Preview and make real-time changes in content

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Adds audio/visual capabilities for remote learners and instructors

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers organizations with a complete customer relationship lifecycle management solution.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM is user-friendly with a clean interface and customizable modules. Relate modules with ease and keep your customers and prospects engaged with live chat options, in-product banners and several other features.

related_products.short_desc: Hootsuite helps you build your brand, strengthen connections with customers, and drive real business results with social media.
related_products.features: Social media is a wild place to do business. That's why thousands of brands rely on Hootsuite's tools and expertise to bring order to the chaos. Launch brilliant social campaigns, deliver 5-star social commerce experiences, and manage all your customer conversations in one place. Plus, get access to industry leading certifications, training, and coaching to help you push your results on social media further, faster.

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk Support is the leading help desk software built for better customer experiences.
related_products.features: Zendesk is the only complete customer service solution, that is both easy to use and scales with your business. On average, companies using Zendesk increase customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% - at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Freshdesk is an easy-to-use customer service software that helps over 50,000 businesses worldwide create stellar customer experiences.
related_products.features: Freshdesk is a cloud-based helpdesk system that offers powerful solutions for customer service. Freshdesk unifies conversations from email, phone, web, chat and social, and helps you resolve issues across channels effortlessly. With Freshdesk, you can also automate workflows, offer convenient self-service options, manage SLAs, and generate reports. Freshdesk is used by over 50,000 customers, including Bridgestone, HP, Harvard University and DHL.

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive helps salespeople expedite their sales process with powerful features, 275+ integrations and an easy, intuitive interface.
related_products.features: In Pipedrive we truly understand the importance of the customer experience when it comes to activity-based selling. Thanks to our easy-to-use sales CRM, equipped with great features and integrations, salespeople can now be fully focused on what matters most to them. Try our CRM built by salespeople and stop having a hard time understanding your customers or driving deals to close.

related_products.short_desc: Put customer service at the heart of your company. Make agents more productive, managers more impactful and customers more empowered.
related_products.features: Zoho Desk is a web-based customer service application that helps your company build stronger relationships with customers. With Zoho Desk, agents become more productive, managers become more impactful, and customers become more empowered. It's customizable, convenient to use, and it doesn't cost you a fortune. Part of Zoho's 40+ strong suite of business software, Zoho Desk brings you the power to put customer service at the heart of your company.

related_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
related_products.features:
LiveAgent is a cloud-based Help Desk Software with over 200+ compatible integrations.

Streamline all customer communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox.

Enjoy social media integration, unlimited ticket history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange, or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end-users worldwide. 

Start with a 14-day free trial, no credit card required, no contracts.

related_products.short_desc: Intercom is a Customer Communications Platform that offers an unparalleled user experience, engaging customers across their lifecycle.
related_products.features: Intercom is the Engagement OS, an open channel between customer and business that is in the product, in the moment, and on their terms. We break down silos, unifying data and systems to create an ongoing dialogue, so companies can make the most of every opportunity.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Userlike is the first and only live chat software to help your business win and nurture customers across messaging channels.
related_products.features:
Offer your customers the best customer service experience through the channels of website chat and mobile messaging.

With Userlike you can chat with your customers via your website, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram and SMS. Connect your chatbot and automate parts of your customer interactions. 

Born and hosted in Germany. Userlike keeps your and your customers' data safe with a 100% GDPR-compliant communication solution.

similar_products.short_desc: Bazaarvoice's customer experience software allows brands and retailers to build smarter shopper experiences across the buyer journey.
similar_products.features: Bazaarvoice's customer experience software lets brands and retailers to easily collect, display, and distribute user-generated content (UGC) at a global scale. Instill shopper confidence and drive conversion. Our software is designed to build smarter shopper experiences across the customer journey.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give business leaders the power to reshape and reimagine your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Quickly iterate to deliver memorable customer experiences that set you apart from the competition. We have purpose-built solutions for NPS?, CSAT, Website Experience, Mobile App Experience, and more.  Contact us to learn about a custom-tailored experience management program for your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Kustomer is the omnichannel SaaS CRM platform reimagining enterprise customer service to deliver standout customer experiences.
similar_products.features: Kustomer is the omnichannel SaaS CRM platform reimagining enterprise customer service to deliver standout customer experiences. Built with intelligent automation, Kustomer scales to meet the needs of any contact center and business by unifying data from multiple sources and enabling companies to deliver effortless, consistent and personalized service and support through a single timeline view.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM Plus is a unified customer experience platform that connects sales, marketing, and customer service teams in one interface.
similar_products.features:
Zoho CRM Plus is the industry's first unified customer experience platform that helps you bridge the gap between your sales, marketing, and customer service teams and deliver an exceptional customer experience.

It combines sales automation, visitor tracking, intelligent chat bots, customer service, project management, email marketing, social media, customer surveys, built-in AI, and unified analytics-all on one platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Keatext helps you easily analyze and build a 360-degree view of your customer feedback to understand what drives customer satisfaction.
similar_products.features:
Understanding how customers feel and what drives behavior at each step of the customer journey is difficult.

With Keatext, you can easily build a 360-degree view of your customer feedback to understand what drives NPS in surveys, star ratings in reviews, or problems in support tickets - all in one platform.

Reduce your analysis time by 98% and improve CX with our innovative AI, seamless integration with apps like Zendesk and Surveymonkey, interactive dashboards, and shareable reports!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Engagement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Engagement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Engagement software helps marketers and business managers create and track customer experiences with personalized, engaging content. Customer engagement software often includes digital and mobile engagement tools, live chat, gamification options, personalized web content, and dynamic forms. Related tools can be found in the Customer Relationship Management software, Customer Loyalty software, Customer Satisfaction software, Gamification software, and Blog software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Loyalty software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Loyalty tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: With Customer Loyalty software, companies can strengthen relationships with their customers in a number of different ways. Gift cards, points and rewards programs, email updates, incentives, VIP programs and more can all help create a loyal customer base. Directories related to Customer Loyalty software are Customer Relationship Management software, Customer Service software, Marketing Automation software and Public Relations software.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Satisfaction software allows businesses to collect, organize, and manage customer feedback. These applications provide survey, complaint tracking and call reporting capabilities. Customer Satisfaction software can integrate with Customer Relationship Management and Product Management solutions to help apply the acquired feedback to business interactions and product development.

related_categories.description: Digital Adoption Platforms help organizations to onboard and train their customers, employees, partners, and prospects by delivering user guidances, walkthroughs, and tutorials for enterprise applications or websites.

Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Qualitative Data Analysis tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Qualitative Data Analysis software is used by scientists and business researchers to discover and understand patterns, such as customer sentiment, in surveys and feedback submissions presented in a variety of text and media files.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Speech Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Speech Analytics software helps organizations capture, track, and analyze ongoing or recorded calls. These tools offer sentiment/emotional analysis, language detection, automatic transcription, as well as other functionality to monitor customer experience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.
